info.emptybrain.myna

Class MynaThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.emptybrain.myna.MynaThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MynaThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class handles the execution of *.sjs and *.ejs files

      • readScript

        public java.lang.String readScript(java.lang.String scriptPath)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Read text content from supplied absolute Filesystem path and returns Serverside JavaScript text.
        Parameters:
        scriptPath - Path to script to read
        Returns:
        Serverside JavaScript text. If the filename ends in .ejs, content is filtered through parseEmbeddedJs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        parseEmbeddedJs(String content)
